mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.* FROM sys_module m INNER JOIN sys_permission p ON m.id = p.module_id INNER JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN sys_admin_role ar ON rp.role_id = ar.role_id WHERE ar.admin_id = #{adminId} AND m.status = 1 AND p.status = 1 ORDER BY m.sort_order
SELECT * FROM sys_module WHERE module_code = #{moduleCode} AND status = 1 LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM sys_module WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} AND status = 1 ORDER BY sort_order
